Summary: BRIGHT WHITE STAR LIKE OBJECT CHANGING COLORS
divs: Sighting DetailsI know one thing for certain is that there is alot of activity in the night sky no matter where you are. Tonight we saw a large white starlike object in the southern sky and it had some funny colors like blue green orange flickering off of it. It is still visible in the night sky and has not moved.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Marshall
There were no other sightings in Marshall on or around April 16th 2008
